channel.title: Npc command is screwed
channel.description: Idk why but I cant seem to fix this is my source. I have the pnpc command but no matter what npc id I enter I'm always hans. I want to turn into Jad, I'm using dodian source. Can anyone help out? I would very much appreciate it.

item.title: Npc command is screwed
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Lolz thats totally wrong, here use this:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Npc command is screwed
item.dc:creator: @Torax1 Torax™
item.description:
@Torax1 wrote:

	}
	if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && (playerRights > 1)) {
		try {
			int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

			if ((newNPC <= 10000) && (newNPC >= 0)) {
				npcId = newNPC;
				isNpc = true;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
		}
